title: The Summoner Laughs Last - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Romance   Smut   Yaoi
tags: Adventurers   Beast Companions   Demons   Doting Love Interests   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Heroes   Inferiority Complex   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Medieval   R-18   Summoning Magic   Weak Protagonist
author: Oboro   おぼろ
description:
The summoner Lion has just been fired from a Hero party, as usual. Since his summoning powers are limited, it turned out to be yet another place where he wasn’t needed.  As Lion travels in search of a job, a mysterious man with a tremendously intimidating air starts following him around.

Um, why is this person following me?

This is a story of a no good summoner’s struggles, taking place on a continent where the demons are governed by four demon kings in the west, east, north and south. 

It’s a fantasy RPG about a chuunibyo summoner.>
